meanings.sent1: The motu was surrounded by clear blue water.

meanings.definition: A type of volcanic island in the Pacific Ocean
meanings.sent1: The motu was formed by powerful volcanic eruptions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the unique ecosystem of the motu.
